name: rebecca j smethurst
body:
Galaxy Zoo PhD Student at the University of Oxford statistically investigating galaxy evolution with a large morphological dataset.

**Supervisor**: *Chris Lintott*

Check out some of the codes I've made:

[**starpy**](github.com/rjsmethurst/starpy) - a python package for determining the best quenched star formation history to describe the observed photometry of a galaxy using stellar population synthesis models and bayesian statistics. 

[**prefig**](http://rjsmethurst.github.io/prefig/) - a python figure class to produce presentation and poster ready plots from your already existing matplotlib code

Check out the papers I've authored on [**ADS**](http://adslabs.org/adsabs/search/?q=+author%3A%22Smethurst%2C+R%22&month_from=&year_from=&month_to=&year_to=&db_f=%28astronomy+OR+physics%29&nr=&bigquery=). 

[**twitter**](www.twitter.com/becky1505) | [github](http://github.com/rjsmethurst) | [**research**](http://www2.physics.ox.ac.uk/contacts/people/smethurst)
